item.description: Join us on Amarante's deck for the sounds of salsa, and drinks at happy hour prices. "Summer snack bar" food is also available for those who need some sustenance. This is New England summer at it's best - boats at anchor, umbrella tables, a cool drink, music, and friendly people. The place to be this Wednesday any time after 5.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be on the patio under a blue umbrella. If you don't spot us, ask the bartender for Nanette.

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Happy Hour on New Haven Harbor
